title: "Expect More Countries to Leave The EU" (with Daniel Kawczynski MP)
itunes:title: "Expect More Countries to Leave The EU" (with Daniel Kawczynski MP)
description:
The Brexit momentum is building. The U.K. government has announced a £700 million investment in border infrastructure, alongside a public information campaign, and more information about it's new immigration policy.

Daniel Kawczynski, Conservative MP for Shrewsbury and Atcham, tells Bloomberg Westminster's Sebastian Salek and Roger Hearing why he thinks Britain won't be the only country to leave the EU in our lifetimes.

Plus, should Britain dump Huawei? Kerry Brown, professor of Chinese studies at King's College London, joins to talk about the delicate relationship ahead of a critical National Security Council meeting on the topic.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
